availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p: Private Washington Pratcher of Company H, 17th Ky vol Inf is hereby discharged the service of the State of Kentucky, said discharge to be as of the date December 31st 1862, he has never been mustered into the United States service
This discharge be a waiver of all claims for Pay, Bounty to said Washington Pratcher for services rendered

By order of the Governor
John Boyle
Adjt Gen of Kentucky
